title: Ms raising and clicks not responding
body: Whenever my ping rises, for example, 20ms to 25ms, my clicks stop working. Im clicking to a location but my champion won't respond. Any suggestions to fix problem?

replies.body:
What you're describing are common symptoms of *Packet Loss*, which happens if there's an issue between your PC and our servers. Before we take a look at your network route, I'd like you to work through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure you aren't running any conflicting network settings.

Let me know if you continue to experience these issues.
